price: (72) Then We will save those who feared Allāh and leave the wrongdoers within it, on their knees.
arabic: ثُمَّ نُنَجِّي ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّقَواْ وَّنَذَرُ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ فِيهَا جِثِيّٗا

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: thumma nunajjī alladhīna ittaqaw wanadharu al-ẓālimīna fīhā jithiyyan
